TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23DB+test.tds.ie+Visitor-dev%2C+Trunkselect * from ( select setting_name, setting_value, setting_depricated_ind, setting_description, setting_visible_ind from safe_system_options where setting_visible_ind = 'Y' union all select 'person_type_' || person_type setting_name, person_type_description setting_value, 'N' setting_depricated_ind, '' setting_description, 'Y' setting_visible_ind from ca_person_type_control union all select setting_name, setting_value, setting_depricated_ind, setting_description, setting_visible_ind from ca_system_portability where not setting_name in (select setting_name from safe_system_options) union all select sau.name setting_name, sau.information setting_value, null setting_depricated_ind, '' setting_description, 'Y' setting_visible_ind from safe_about_us sau where name = 'version' union all select 'dbtimezoneoffset' setting_name, to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'tzr') setting_value, 'N' setting_depricated_ind, 'Database Offset' setting_description, 'Y' setting_visible_ind from dual ) where safe_request_permissions_pak.check_permission_sql (:Uidtoken, '()', 'systemSettings', 'GET')='Y'
